definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]

sentences.english: The oxygen autogenous smelting process of nickeliferous copper concentrate from Jinchuan Nonferrous Corp. is thermodynamically analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对金川二次铜精矿氧气自热熔炼过程进行热力学分析。

sentences.english: Electric furnace is major equipment of zinc powder reduction smelting.
sentences.chinese: 电炉是锌粉工艺进行还原熔炼的承载设备。

sentences.english: This article introduces the development of cupola melting technology at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国内外冲天炉熔炼控制技术的发展状况。

sentences.english: Cupola is the most inportant melting equipment for production cast iron up to now.
sentences.chinese: 冲天炉至今仍是铸铁生产最主要的熔炼设备。

sentences.english: A mixture of a metal with its sulfides, produced by smelting the sulfide ores of copper, lead, or nickel.
sentences.chinese: 锍，冰铜一种带有硫化物的金属混合物，由熔炼。

sentences.english: Corundum abrasive with bauxite as the main raw material formed at high temperature melting.
sentences.chinese: 棕刚玉磨料以铝矾土为主要原料经高温熔炼而成。

sentences.english: An example of calculation for copper-smelting process is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中给出了一个关于铜熔炼过程的计算实例。

sentences.english: Other applications include melting welding and brazing or metals.
sentences.chinese: 其它应用包括熔炼，焊接和钎焊或金属。

sentences.english: In this paper, composite electrode alloy with multi-phase is prepared by two-step re-melting.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用两步熔炼法制备多相复合电极合金。

sentences.english: Numismatic evidence of the advances made by smelting technology in ancient India.
sentences.chinese: 钱币的证据表明了古印度有了熔炼的技术。

sentences.english: The composite material can be prepared through induction melting and copper mold casting methods.
sentences.chinese: 该复合材料可通过感应熔炼和铜模浇铸的方法制备。

sentences.english: Power shortages have disrupted mining and smelting in several countries.
sentences.chinese: 动力短缺已经使多个国家的采矿和熔炼中断。

sentences.english: The progress of cupola and induction furnace melting techniques of cast iron in Japan was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了日本冲天炉，感应电炉的铸铁熔炼技术进展。

sentences.english: Rare earth based AB2 type alloy has been synthesized by arc melting constituent elemente.
sentences.chinese: 用真空电孤熔炼合成了稀土基AB2型合金。

sentences.english: When he said smelting, I said, OK, you got it.
sentences.chinese: 当他说熔炼，我会说，好，你明白了。

sentences.english: Copula net diagram is an important tool for guiding the cupola operation.
sentences.chinese: 网形图是指导冲天炉熔炼操作的重要工具。

definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
variant of 洗練|洗练[xi3 lian4]
to refine (a substance)/to purify/to refine (one's skills, writing etc)/refined/polished/succinct/skilled/capable
